ComicInfo.Title: Notes #30; The Republican Picnic; Bitchy Bitch Gets Good and Ready!; Comic Books Aren't Just for Boys Anymore!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-18 00:42:22. [CVDB164605] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-10 22:44:16. [Issue ID 170743]
ComicInfo.Summary:
Roberta and a friend go to the state Republican Party picnic
Midge stocks up for the coming Y2K crash, lets Chuck come over to apologize, and beds him. At work, Sylvia introduces the new Y2K consultant and tells everyone they'll be working Saturdays for a while. David says hello to Marcie at work; she explodes at him and complains to his company about harassment; when he shows up to ask why, she calls again and says he's stalking her. Midge discovers porn under Chuck's mattress; she also goes to a Y2K-preparation fair and discovers that Marcie is carrying a gun.
Her formative years as a cartoonist
